00025 #ifndef __context_switch_h__
00026 #define __context_switch_h__

00040 #define CONTEXT_SWITCH_PREAMBLE()                       \
00041    {                                                    \
00042       asm volatile(                                     \
00043          "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t"                         \
00044          "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t"                         \
00045          : "=r" (_current_thread->sp) : );              \
00046                                                         \
00047       asm volatile(                                     \
00048          "out __SP_H__, %B0\n\t"                        \
00049          "out __SP_L__, %A0\n\t"                        \
00050          :: "r" (stack_addr) );                         \
00051                                                         \
00052       asm volatile(                                     \
00053          "push %A0\n\t"                                 \
00054          "push %B0\n\t"                                 \
00055          :: "r" (start_wrapper) );                      \
00056                                                         \
00057       for(i = 0; i < 31; i++)                           \
00058         asm volatile("push __zero_reg__\n\t" ::);       \
00059                                                         \
00060       asm volatile(                                     \
00061          "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t"                         \
00062          "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t"                         \
00063          : "=r" (threads[id].sp) : );                   \
00064                                                         \
00065       asm volatile(                                     \
00066          "out __SP_H__, %B0\n\t"                        \
00067          "out __SP_L__, %A0\n\t"                        \
00068          :: "r" (_current_thread->sp) );                \
00069                                                         \
00070    }
00071 
00077 #define PUSH_THREAD_STACK()                     \
00078    {                                            \
00079       asm volatile(                             \
00080          "push r24\n\t"                         \
00081          "in r24, __SREG__\n\t"                 \
00082          "cli\n\t"                              \
00083          "push r24\n\t"                         \
00084          );                                     \
00085       asm volatile(                             \
00086          "push r31\n\t"                         \
00087          "push r30\n\t"                         \
00088          "push r29\n\t"                         \
00089          "push r28\n\t"                         \
00090          "push r27\n\t"                         \
00091          "push r26\n\t"                         \
00092          "push r25\n\t"                         \
00093          "push r23\n\t"                         \
00094          "push r22\n\t"                         \
00095          "push r21\n\t"                         \
00096          "push r20\n\t"                         \
00097          "push r19\n\t"                         \
00098          "push r18\n\t"                         \
00099          "push r17\n\t"                         \
00100          "push r16\n\t"                         \
00101          "push r15\n\t"                         \
00102          "push r14\n\t"                         \
00103          "push r13\n\t"                         \
00104          "push r12\n\t"                         \
00105          "push r11\n\t"                         \
00106          "push r10\n\t"                         \
00107          "push r9\n\t"                          \
00108          "push r8\n\t"                          \
00109          "push r7\n\t"                          \
00110          "push r6\n\t"                          \
00111          "push r5\n\t"                          \
00112          "push r4\n\t"                          \
00113          "push r3\n\t"                          \
00114          "push r2\n\t"                          \
00115          /*"push r1\n\t"*/                      \
00116          /*"push r0\n\t"*/                      \
00117          );                                     \
00118       asm volatile(                             \
00119          "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t"                 \
00120          "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t"                 \
00121          : "=r" (_current_thread->sp) : );      \
00122    }
00123 
00129 #define POP_THREAD_STACK()                      \
00130    {                                            \
00131       asm volatile(                             \
00132          "out __SP_H__, %B0\n\t"                \
00133          "out __SP_L__, %A0\n\t"                \
00134          :: "r" (_current_thread->sp));         \
00135       asm volatile(                             \
00136          /*"pop r0\n\t"*/                       \
00137          /*"pop r1\n\t"*/                       \
00138          "pop r2\n\t"                           \
00139          "pop r3\n\t"                           \
00140          "pop r4\n\t"                           \
00141          "pop r5\n\t"                           \
00142          "pop r6\n\t"                           \
00143          "pop r7\n\t"                           \
00144          "pop r8\n\t"                           \
00145          "pop r9\n\t"                           \
00146          "pop r10\n\t"                          \
00147          "pop r11\n\t"                          \
00148          "pop r12\n\t"                          \
00149          "pop r13\n\t"                          \
00150          "pop r14\n\t"                          \
00151          "pop r15\n\t"                          \
00152          "pop r16\n\t"                          \
00153          "pop r17\n\t"                          \
00154          "pop r18\n\t"                          \
00155          "pop r19\n\t"                          \
00156          "pop r20\n\t"                          \
00157          "pop r21\n\t"                          \
00158          "pop r22\n\t"                          \
00159          "pop r23\n\t"                          \
00160          "pop r25\n\t"                          \
00161          "pop r26\n\t"                          \
00162          "pop r27\n\t"                          \
00163          "pop r28\n\t"                          \
00164          "pop r29\n\t"                          \
00165          "pop r30\n\t"                          \
00166          "pop r31\n\t"                          \
00167          "pop r24\n\t"                          \
00168          "out __SREG__, r24\n\t"                \
00169          "pop r24\n\t"                          \
00170          /*"sei\n\t"*/                          \
00171          );                                     \
00172    }
